reference.shortdesc: A quotation is a small group of words that is taken from a text or speech and repeated by someone other than the original author or speaker.

section.title: Formatting expectations
section.p: Processors typically render a quotation inline.

section.title: Processing expectations
section.p: Processors that render the q element SHOULD add appropriate styling, such as locale-specific quotation marks.

example.title: Example
example.p: In the following code sample, the q element contains a quotation. Note that no quotation marks are included; locale-specific quotation marks will be generated during processing.
example.codeblock: George said, Disengage the power supply before servicing the unit.
